0.text: Innate: Jax's basic attacks  on-attack grant him a stack of Relentless Assault for 2.5 seconds, stacking up to 8 times while refreshing the duration on subsequent attacks. Each stack grants him 3.5% − 11% (based on level)  bonus attack speed, up to 28% − 88% (based on level) at 8 stacks.

1.text: Stacks expire one at a time, by one every 0.25 seconds.

0.text: Active: Jax  dashes to the target unit's location.

1.text: If the target is an enemy and they are in range upon arrival, Jax deals them physical damage.

2.text: Jax will be ordered to basic attack the target afterwards.

0.text: Active: Jax's next basic attack or  Leap Strike against an enemy within 10 seconds deals bonus magic damage. If Empower is used on a basic attack, it will gain  50 bonus range.

1.text: Empower  resets Jax's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Jax enters Evasion for 2 seconds: a defensive stance that causes him to  dodge all incoming non- turret basic attacks and take 25%  reduced damage from all area of effect abilities sourced from  champions.

1.text: Counter Strike can be recast after 1 second, and does so automatically after the duration.

2.text: Recast: Jax deals physical damage to nearby enemies, increased by 20% for each attack dodged up to a 100% increase, and  stuns them for 1 second.

0.text: Passive: Jax's basic attacks  on-hit grant a stack for 2.5 seconds, stacking up to 2 times while refreshing the duration on subsequent attacks. At 2 stacks, Jax's next basic attack  on-hit consumes the stacks to deal bonus magic damage.

1.text: Active: Jax gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance for 8 seconds.

1.concerningText: If the target is an enemy and they are in range upon arrival, Jax deals them physical damage.

2.concerningText: Active: Jax's next basic attack or  Leap Strike against an enemy within 10 seconds deals bonus magic damage. If Empower is used on a basic attack, it will gain  50 bonus range.

3.concerningText: Recast: Jax deals physical damage to nearby enemies, increased by 20% for each attack dodged up to a 100% increase, and  stuns them for 1 second.

4.concerningText: Passive: Jax's basic attacks  on-hit grant a stack for 2.5 seconds, stacking up to 2 times while refreshing the duration on subsequent attacks. At 2 stacks, Jax's next basic attack  on-hit consumes the stacks to deal bonus magic damage.
Active: Jax gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance for 8 seconds.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
Corrupting Potion can be used even at full health and mana.
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals ( 12% / 9%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion, heal for ( 7.8% / 3.6%) of the target's maximum health, with a minimum heal equal to ( 97.5% / 60%) base AD (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5% armor penetration, and 5% magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals ( 12% /  9%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion,  heal for ( 7.8% /  3.6%) of the target's maximum health, with a minimum heal equal to ( 97.5% /  60%) base AD (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Mist's Edge: Basic attacks deal ( 10% / 6%) of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.
Unique – Siphon: Basic attacks on-hit against enemy champions apply a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes all stacks to deal 40 − 150 (based on level) bonus magic damage on-hit and slow the target by 25% for 2 seconds, while also granting you 25% bonus movement speed for the same duration (20 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MIST'S EDGE: Basic attacks deal ( 10% /  6%) of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bloodlust: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for ( 2% / 1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% / 3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.
Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 100 damage for 4 seconds, increased by ( 8% / 4.8%) maximum health per stack of Bloodlust, up to an increase of ( 40% / 24%) maximum health at 5 Bloodlust stacks (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 35% / 15%) of all post-mitigation physical damage received, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
